title: A Man called Edison
creator_credit: Dennis R. Atkinson and Spectra Pictures
brief_description: Presents Thomas Edison’s contributions to the motion picture industry through his early kinetoscope films. Provides a vivid panorama of early moviemaking. Suitable for secondary level.
